title: Minecraft
short_plot_summary: In Minecraft, players explore a blocky, procedurally-generated world where they mine resources, craft items, build structures, and fend off monsters.
explanation: A pickaxe, representing the mining and resource gathering aspect of the game
A tree, symbolizing the natural resources found in the game world and the importance of cutting down trees for crafting materials
A brick, illustrating the building and construction aspect of the game
A potion, signifying the crafting and enchanting mechanics
A zombie, representing the hostile monsters players must protect themselves against
